item.title: R package httpgd released on CRAN
item.description: My R package httpgd is now released on CRAN. This graphics device package allows to access R graphics with any browser (and for developers via a very simple HTTP/WebSocket API). I started working on this about a year ago with the goal of creating an embedded plot viewer pane for R in Visual Studio Code. It can now be installed via: install.packages("httpgd")
